metadata.title: CVE-2022-29190 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Pion DTLS is a Go implementation of Datagram Transport Layer Security.Prior to version 2.1.4, an attacker can send packets that sends Pion DTLSinto an infinite loop when processing. Version 2.1.4 contains a patch forthis issue. There are currently no known workarounds available.

criterions.comment: pion package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
